Vitayu vas, druzi! This is Roman Steblo website.

![Photo of Roman Steblo](photo_2022-06-10_23-54-32.jpg){width="342"}\
Roman Steblo is a political science student from Ukraine, struggling to theoretyzing, analysis of social life and victory over klyata rusnya. Topics of interest: governance, theory of modernization, nationalism in global world, security and defence.

Alma-mater: National University of Kyiv-Mohyla [Academy](https://www.ukma.edu.ua/).

Articles:

1.  [Moments of madness: the impact of contentious politics on the development of civil society in Ukraine](http://ekmair.ukma.edu.ua/handle/123456789/20683).
2.  [Will the defense order be fulfilled](https://www.epravda.com.ua/columns/2020/12/31/669676/)?
